title: Italy's left picks 'anti-Meloni' politician Elly Schlein to lead the party | Euronews
snippet: All the while, her supporters sang "Bella Ciao" - Italy’s anti-fascist Resistance anthem. Schlein, who belongs to the PD’s more socialist wing, aims to present a fresh and unifying vision for the left and the country.

title: Elly Schlein voted leader of Italy’s most important leftwing party in surprise win | Italy | The Guardian
snippet: Schlein, a former MEP, first came to prominence in early 2020 after her small party, Coraggiosa (Courageous), played a pivotal role in stopping the far right from seizing power in the traditionally leftwing Emilia-Romagna region.

title: Elly Schlein - Wikipedia
snippet: In an upset, for the first time ... became the PD's first female, as well as the youngest person, to be elected leader of the PD since the formation of the party in 2007. She is also the first publicly-declared LGBTQ secretary of the Italian centre-left leading party...

title: Meet the Italian left’s rising star
snippet: Elly Schlein, a former MEP, is hoping to reinvigorate the left. Schlein's optimism and left-wing focus has earned her comparisons to a fellow leftist across the Atlantic. | Zumapress via Belga ...

title: A former Obama campaign staffer is the first woman to lead Italy's main left-wing party
snippet: A rising star of the Italian left has won election to the leadership of the Democratic Party, the country’s second-largest political group. Thirty-seven-year-old Elly Schlein will serve as the main opposition leader to Giorgia Meloni, the ...
